text:
Good atmosphere to chill but the service standards really chase people off.

Kopi and tarts need to either train their workers here or rearrange manpowers who can serve better.

Bought a few tarts/muffins but staff pack all into paper bags. Ask for container and she gave a black face.
Saw reviews on Kopi Tarts and come across nearest to my house,  so I decided to give it a try on their chicken pie. Result is so so only, not much fillings.

Food and service are horrible.. the pie is cold and so ex but the filling only 1/4.. understand the high rental in sg but their food & drinks are overpriced with zero quality. they screwed up the order and came up to you later to collect more money from you.

I am working at New tech park, looking forward for kopi & tarts open. Today 19/7 8.30am i order a set of take away big breakfast.
Cashier at the counter is very good with his service buy taking order.
I waited for around 10mins, but when i reach office i open and eat is really horrible. After waited for so long stumbles eggs is so cold and tasteless.
Its so disappointed.
Hope to see some improvement.

There were 3 staff on duty and no one attended to me even though I was patiently waiting and there was only one other customer in the shop. They made eye contact with me but did not bother to inform or say if they would attend to me. If they are going to charge $4.20 for a cup of coffee they need to work on having better customer service.
